name: Giacomo Guiulfo
bio: C is my favorite programming language because of the simplicity it offers and the fact that you can really be in 'total' control of programs written with it. I've programmed in C professionally, at school and for many personal projects.

name: Gargi Sharma
bio: C was the first programming language I learnt and it still is one of my favorites. I wrote C professionally for Linux Kernel!
